channel.title: CVE Feed for Moxa -- NPort 5000AI-M12 Series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Moxa -- NPort 5000AI-M12 Series

item.title: CVE-2023-4929|2024-08-02T07:44:52.628Z -- moxa -- nport%205000ai-m12%20series
item.description: All firmware versions of the NPort 5000 Series are affected by an improper validation of integrity check vulnerability. This vulnerability results from insufficient checks on firmware updates or upgrades, potentially allowing malicious users to manipulate the firmware and gain control of devices.
